talk with you about immigration.

limitless possibilities –- people not trapped

29.text:

374.text:

379.text: Now, let’s be clear about what it isn’t.

383.text:
This deal does not apply to anyone who has
come to this country recently.

388.text:
It does not apply to anyone who might come

393.text:

402.text:

What our country needs from us right now is

526.text:

560.text: But that’s not what these steps would do.
